title: StarTalk Live! Big Brains at BAM (Part 1)
description:
Delve into the human brain when Neil deGrasse Tyson and Eugene Mirman host The Big Bang Theory’s Mayim Bialik, Dr. Heather Berlin, Michael Ian Black, Paul Rudd and Bill Nye at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
Read more and listen to the full show:
http://www.startalkradio.net/show/startalk-live-big-brains-at-bam-part-1/
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
